content.rendered: Hey everybody! I came across this article recently and was very happy to find Daggers High listed as number 16 on this list! One thing that is very neat about Board Game Geek is the subscribe feature, which notifies me whenever somebody says something about the projects I follow (such as my own). Either way, I’m really glad that Daggers High is getting at least some recognition. It was also really cool to see a lot of other games up there too. It’s really neat that this reviewer is covering a bunch of unreleased games and giving them coverage.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Blue Giant previews Daggers High
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today, I'd like to share with you a video that Blue Giant Media recently released. They made a gameplay preview of Daggers High that went through Freshman year, and talked about setting up the game. Check out the video below: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jZiz9Yhrlds&t=12s Blue Giant Media previews Daggers High It's…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Interview with the Friendly Boardgamer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Friendly Boardgamer just released an interview featuring me! You can check out the original article here: https://thefriendlyboardgamer.wordpress.com/2019/06/05/jorge-zhang-daggers-highschool/ Here is the article: This interview is with Jorge Zhang who is the designer of Daggers Highschool, a game about bribing your way in to the best University. We also talked about…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Board Game Geek Listing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! I'm back for this week's post. Today I wanted to share something exciting: we got Daggers High listed on Board Game Geek.com! You can find the listing here: https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/260548/daggers-high. This is pretty neat since it is another place to discuss and share things about the game. Also check…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Why you should submit to the Board Game Workshop Design Contest
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I've been working on Lord of Colors in my spare time for a while now, and since I don't currently have any long term plans with it, I figured I'd submit it to a contest to see how it does. I'm very interested to see what people have…

jetpack-related-posts.title: So, you want to launch a board game on Kickstarter? Read this first. (2019)
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Sorry for my one month hiatus from writing blog posts- during this time I have been managing the campaign for Daggers Highschool. Anyway, Kickstarter is what I want to talk about in this blog post. There's already a wealth of information on this topic online, and so for…
